pr_title: Fail fast INSERT with Kafka Schema registry tables

timeline.bodyText: Do we need to push the data so as to access the table ?
timeline.author: Praveen2112

replies.bodyText: Yes, we need. Serializer is responsible to push schema to Schema Registry. If you don't write anything, then serializer won't serialize anything and schema won't appear in schema registry.
replies.author: kokosing

timeline.message: Make methods static whenever possible in Kafka
Fail fast INSERT with Kafka Schema registry tables
